links.label: The Golden Age of Radio: Program 35 - February, 1973 - Don Ameche

infos.info: Betty was a girl of humble origins, a simple but lovely secretary who worked for Bob Drake, dashing heir to a vast fortune. When Bob fell in love with her, his inheritance was compromised: he was forced into Betty's workaday world and the frightening prospect of making a living. They had a son, Bobby, whose presence did little but slow the pace of the show.
